Module fi.tuni.prog3.sisu
Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Interface iReadAndWriteToFile

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileHandler
public interface iReadAndWriteToFile
Interface with methods to read from a file and write to a file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    readFromFile(File fileName)
    Reads JSON from the given file.
    boolean
    writeToFile(String fileName, User user)
    Write the student progress as JSON into the given file.

  • Method Details

    • readFromFile

      User readFromFile(File fileName) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Reads JSON from the given file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file to read from.
      Returns:
      true if the read was successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be accessed.
      IOException

    • writeToFile

      boolean writeToFile(String fileName, User user) throws IOException
      Write the student progress as JSON into the given file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file to write to.
      user - User object to include in the file
      Returns:
      true if the write was successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      IOException - if it cannot write to a file.
